issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: The product is working as designed.
resolution.name: Not a Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Noticed this earlier and now confirmed in QA, when the dns name for services is used (which you get with eucarc after dns is configured) requests to various services fail.

For example here is euca-bundle-and-upload-image using ip name for endpoint of objectstorage vs dns name. Both run on the CLC host.
{code}
[root@c-35 ~]# euca-bundle-and-upload-image -U http://10.111.1.70:8773/services/objectstorage -i somefile.xml -r i386 -b foobucket
/var/tmp/bundle-GJaafl/somefile.xml.part.00 100% |=====================================================================================================================| 160.00  B  55.78  B/s Time: 0:00:02
/var/tmp/bundle-GJaafl/somefile.xml.manifest.xml 100% |================================================================================================================|   3.30 kB   1.46 kB/s Time: 0:00:02
Uploaded foobucket/somefile.xml.manifest.xml
[root@c-35 ~]# euca-bundle-and-upload-image -U http://compute.c-35.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/services/objectstorage -i somefile.xml -r i386 -b foobucket
euca-bundle-and-upload-image: error: connection error
{code}

topology:
\[CLC UFS\]
\[UFS WS CC SC\]
\[NC\]

{code}
[root@c-35 ~]# euca-describe-services
SERVICE	jetty          	eucalyptus     	10.111.1.70    	ENABLED   	36  	http://10.111.1.70:8773/services/Jetty  	arn:euca:eucalyptus::jetty:10.111.1.70/
SERVICE	notifications  	eucalyptus     	10.111.1.70    	ENABLED   	36  	http://10.111.1.70:8773/services/Notifications	arn:euca:eucalyptus::notifications:10.111.1.70/

SERVICE	loadbalancingba	eucalyptus     	10.111.1.70    	NOTREADY  	36  	http://10.111.1.70:8773/services/LoadBalancingBackend	arn:euca:eucalyptus::loadbalancingbackend:10.111.1.70/
SERVICE	autoscalingback	eucalyptus     	10.111.1.70    	ENABLED   	36  	http://10.111.1.70:8773/services/AutoScalingBackend	arn:euca:eucalyptus::autoscalingbackend:10.111.1.70/
SERVICE	tokens         	tokens         	TOK_116        	ENABLED   	36  	http://10.111.1.116:8773/services/Tokens	arn:euca:bootstrap:tokens:tokens:TOK_116/
SERVICE	tokens         	tokens         	TOK_70         	ENABLED   	36  	http://10.111.1.70:8773/services/Tokens 	arn:euca:bootstrap:tokens:tokens:TOK_70/
SERVICE	bootstrap      	bootstrap      	10.111.1.70    	ENABLED   	36  	http://10.111.1.70:8773/services/Empyrean	arn:euca:bootstrap:::10.111.1.70/
SERVICE	eucalyptus     	eucalyptus     	10.111.1.70    	ENABLED   	36  	http://10.111.1.70:8773/services/Eucalyptus	arn:euca:eucalyptus:::10.111.1.70/
SERVICE	autoscaling    	autoscaling    	AS_116         	ENABLED   	36  	http://10.111.1.116:8773/services/AutoScaling	arn:euca:bootstrap:autoscaling:autoscaling:AS_116/

SERVICE	loadbalancing  	loadbalancing  	LB_116         	ENABLED   	36  	http://10.111.1.116:8773/services/LoadBalancing	arn:euca:bootstrap:loadbalancing:loadbalancing:LB_116/
SERVICE	loadbalancing  	loadbalancing  	LB_70          	ENABLED   	36  	http://10.111.1.70:8773/services/LoadBalancing	arn:euca:bootstrap:loadbalancing:loadbalancing:LB_70/
SERVICE	storage        	PARTI00        	SC_116         	ENABLED   	36  	http://10.111.1.116:8773/services/Storage	arn:euca:eucalyptus:PARTI00:storage:SC_116/
SERVICE	cloudwatchbacke	eucalyptus     	10.111.1.70    	ENABLED   	36  	http://10.111.1.70:8773/services/CloudWatchBackend	arn:euca:eucalyptus::cloudwatchbackend:10.111.1.70/
SERVICE	objectstorage  	objectstorage  	OSG_116        	ENABLED   	36  	http://10.111.1.116:8773/services/objectstorage	arn:euca:bootstrap:objectstorage:objectstorage:OSG_116/

SERVICE	walrusbackend  	walrus         	WS_116         	ENABLED   	36  	http://10.111.1.116:8773/services/WalrusBackend	arn:euca:bootstrap:walrus:walrusbackend:WS_116/
SERVICE	euare          	euare          	EUA_116        	ENABLED   	36  	http://10.111.1.116:8773/services/Euare 	arn:euca:bootstrap:euare:euare:EUA_116/

SERVICE	cloudwatch     	cloudwatch     	CW_70          	ENABLED   	36  	http://10.111.1.70:8773/services/CloudWatch	arn:euca:bootstrap:cloudwatch:cloudwatch:CW_70/
SERVICE	imaging        	imaging        	10.111.1.70    	NOTREADY  	36  	http://10.111.1.70:8773/services/Imaging	arn:euca:bootstrap:imaging:imaging:10.111.1.70/
SERVICE	dns            	eucalyptus     	10.111.1.70    	ENABLED   	36  	http://10.111.1.70:8773/services/Dns    	arn:euca:eucalyptus::dns:10.111.1.70/
{code}
fields.summary: Using fqdn for service paths result in failure

comments.body:
Here is an example with ec2 (create keypair) with debug

Using fqdn
{code}
[root@c-35 ~]# euca-create-keypair -U http://compute.c-35.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/services/compute foo-key > fookey --debug
2014-04-09 21:30:15,695 DEBUG   CreateKeyPair parsed arguments: {'security_token': None, 'url': 'http://compute.c-35.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/services/compute', 'region': None, 'filename': None, 'KeyName': 'foo-key', 'show_empty_fields': False, 'key_id': None, 'secret_key': None}
2014-04-09 21:30:15,697 INFO    CreateKeyPair parameters: {'Action': 'CreateKeyPair', 'KeyName': 'foo-key', 'Version': '2013-02-01'}
2014-04-09 21:30:15,697 INFO    EC2 sending request (attempt 1 of 3)
2014-04-09 21:30:15,698 DEBUG   QuerySigV2Auth string to sign: 'POST\ncompute.c-35.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773\n/services/compute\nAWSAccessKeyId=AKIXKZOY7WNQ1XUTR0RX&Action=CreateKeyPair&KeyName=foo-key&SignatureMethod=HmacSHA256&SignatureVersion=2&Timestamp=2014-04-10T04%3A30%3A15Z&Version=2013-02-01'

2014-04-09 21:30:15,698 DEBUG   QuerySigV2Auth converting params to POST data

2014-04-09 21:30:15,704 DEBUG   EC2 request data:   Version: 2013-02-01
2014-04-09 21:30:15,743 DEBUG   EC2 connection error
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/requestbuilder/service.py", line 151, in send_request
    method, url, params, data, files, headers, auth)
  File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/requestbuilder/service.py", line 239, in __log_and_send_request
    return self.session.send(p_request, stream=True, timeout=self.timeout)
  File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/requests/sessions.py", line 374, in send
    r = adapter.send(request, **kwargs)
  File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/requests/adapters.py", line 206, in send
    raise ConnectionError(sockerr)
ConnectionError: [Errno -2] Name or service not known
euca-create-keypair: error: connection error
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/usr/bin/euca-create-keypair", line 6, in <module>
    euca2ools.commands.ec2.createkeypair.CreateKeyPair.run()
  File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/requestbuilder/command.py", line 286, in run
    cmd.handle_cli_exception(err)
  File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/requestbuilder/request.py", line 228, in handle_cli_exception
    BaseCommand.handle_cli_exception(self, err)
  File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/requestbuilder/command.py", line 283, in run
    result = cmd.main()
  File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/requestbuilder/request.py", line 209, in main
    response = self.send()
  File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/requestbuilder/request.py", line 158, in send
    auth=self.auth)
  File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/requestbuilder/service.py", line 188, in send_request
    raise ClientError('connection error')
requestbuilder.exceptions.ClientError: connection error
{code}

Using IP

Helpdesk ticket filed asking for investigation of our DNS service, IT-221
This was a result of IT-221. IT restarted bind on hollister and resolution for the delegated domain is working again.
